titleStmt.title: Christs kingdome Described in seuen fruitfull sermons vpon the second Psalme. By Richard Web preacher of Gods word. The contents whereof follows after the epistles.
titleStmt.author: Webb, Richard, preacher of God's word.

publicationStmt.publisher: printed by Nicholas Okes for Henry Rockit, and are to be sold at his shop in the Poultry, vnder S. Mildreds Diall,

notesStmt.note: Copy at reel 2087 has print faded on title page.
Reproduction of original in the Folger Shakespeare Library.
